title: Courgette and goat's cheese quiche
ingredients: ['1 (375g) ready rolled shortcrust pastry', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '5 spring onions, sliced', '3 or 4 medium courgettes, sliced', '3 eggs', '100ml single cream', "200g goat's cheese, broken up", '100g Gruyere cheese, grated', 'salt to taste', '1 tablespoon freshly chopped mint', '1 teaspoon ground paprika', 'pepper to taste']
